column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Today I got up a little early to get to the library as soon as it opened .
#id=2
#text=It 's about a 30 minute trip , but I love the drive .
#id=3
#text=As I got to the library , the librarian greeted me with a big smile and made small talk .
#id=4
#text=I then looked up the book I wanted on the computer .
#id=5
#text=It was available , and I made my way down the long rows of bookshelves .
#id=6
#text=I found my book easily , and I also found a couple others I 'd like .
#id=7
#text=I carried my stack of books to the counter , and the same librarian was happy to help me .
#id=8
#text=She told me my book choices were great and she also recommended some further reading .
#id=9
#text=She checked out my books in the computer .
#text=Two of the books needed to be returned in two weeks and the other needed to be returned in one week .
#text=I 'll likely return them all in one week .
#text=I left and went to the park to start reading .
